message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,250?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $12,750. Can you consider this offer?
